Alternate Data Services

Experience seamless verification with our alternate data services, featuring over 30 high-quality APIs. From card verification to driving licenses, electricity bills, GST, and beyond, we have got you end-to-end solutions. Our KYC solutions prioritize data security and adhere to global data privacy standards.
Read more >

AI Based Facial And Document Recognition

Our AI-based facial and document recognition technology enhances security. We validate customer identities, reducing the risk of identity theft. Now experience cost savings, faster onboarding, and improved accuracy with our unique verification solution.
Read more >

Electronic Residence Physical Verification

Unlock the future of address verification without visiting the physical location. Our revolutionary digital solution with advanced features like GEO-tagging coordinates is reshaping the landscape of verification.
Read more >

PAN, Aadhar and Driving Licence Fraud Check

With advanced capabilities like automating customer risk profiling, document type detection, and state-of-the-art OCR for data recognition, we ensure accuracy is always met. Our system cross-links also raises alarms when any manual verification is required.
Read more >

Bank Statement Analyzer

Our innovative bank statement analysis leverages advanced techniques and generates comprehensive reports from uploaded bank statements, offering a 360-degree view of an applicant’s financial health. This enables quicker credit assessments and real-time decision-making.
Read more >

Introducing Timble Suraksha Kavach

Timble Suraksha Kavach offers advanced solutions, detecting and countering rising fraud for secure operations.

With real-time protection, build trust and fortify your enterprise for thriving, assured protection.
